mapper.select: SELECT rh.novel_id FROM reader_history rh WHERE rh.timestamp >= #{startTime} and rh.timestamp < #{endTime} GROUP BY rh.novel_id ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC limit 100

WITH novels AS ( SELECT nat.novel_id FROM novel_tags nt JOIN novel_and_tags nat ON nt.id = nat.tag_id WHERE nt.tag_name = #{tagName} ) SELECT rh.novel_id FROM novels JOIN reader_history rh ON novels.novel_id = rh.novel_id WHERE rh.timestamp >= #{startTime} and rh.timestamp < #{endTime} GROUP BY rh.novel_id ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC limit 100
SELECT ni.id FROM novel_info ni ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 100
WITH t1 AS ( SELECT nat.novel_id FROM novel_tags nt JOIN novel_and_tags nat ON nt.id = nat.tag_id WHERE nt.tag_name = #{tagName} ) SELECT t1.novel_id FROM t1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 100

SELECT nat.tag_id FROM (SELECT novel_id FROM reader_history rh WHERE rh.user_id = #{userId}) t1 LEFT JOIN novel_and_tags nat ON t1.novel_id = nat.novel_id GROUP BY nat.tag_id ORDER BY COUNT(nat.tag_id) DESC LIMIT 2
